name: eFootball PES 2021 LITE
description:
To play this game on PS5, your system may need to be updated to the latest system software. Although this game is playable on PS5, some features available on PS4 may be absent. See PlayStation.com/bc for more details.
Free to play (includes in-game purchases)

eFootball PES 2021 SEASON UPDATE LITE: Available Now!

The free-to-play version of the eFootball PES 2021 SEASON UPDATE is now available for download.
Download PES 2021 LITE today to build your dream team in myClub, support your favorite sides in Matchday, and kick off your esports career in eFootball mode!

Take the reins of PES partner clubs like FC Barcelona, FC Bayern München, Juventus, and Manchester United, as well as a wide range of other exciting teams!

*myClub data from the full version of the game can be accessed from LITE and vice-versa.
*PES 2021 LITE allows you to play online matches against owners of the full version.
*Master League is only available in the full version of PES 2021. Check the official website for a full list of all the modes included in PES 2021 LITE.
*Some clubs are not available in certain modes.
*Not all eFootball mode competitions are available in PES 2021 LITE.
*Due to the ongoing impact of COVID-19, certain real-world soccer leagues and/or tournaments may undergo sudden regulation changes. As a result, there is a chance that in-game regulations may not perfectly match their real life counterparts. Other changes that impact leagues and tournaments may also be implemented in future updates without prior notice.
